attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whole villages and swathes of agricultural land will be surrendered to the sea because the Government is unwilling to spend billions of pounds on flood defences. Ministers have admitted privately that they are preparing to evacuate settlements on the east coast within the next 30 years because it is not "cost effective" to save them.

All this while Holland is defending every square inch we are intending to give up large acreage of land which we desperately need for food security as well as really significant numbers of houses. This can not be allowed

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
